title: rustdoc: failed to normalize

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code `./tests/ui/union/projection-as-union-type-error.rs` ```Rust #![crate_type = "lib"] pub trait Identity { type Identity; } pub type Foo = u8; pub union Bar { a: ::Identity, //~ ERROR b: u8, } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: Regression in #106938 ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:198:90: Failed to normalize ::Identity, maybe try to call `try_normalize_erasing_regions` instead thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/8996ea93b6e554148c4286e62b613f12a3ee505c/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f5a7c76a56a -
